item.title: Where
item.dc:creator: @stormcutter stormcutter
item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

where does this go lol
class isLetter {

public static void main(String[] args) {
	char[] c = {'a', 'b', 'c', '$', ' ', '1'};
	for(char c1 : c)
		if(!Character.isLetterOrDigit(c1))
			System.out.println("Character '"+c1+"' is not a letter or digit.");
}

}

i put it under runserver but wont work anyone know wher
